examplePhrases: Alexa ask cactus facts for a fact
Alexa tell cactus facts to tell me trivia
en-AU.name: fact
en-AU.description:
Ask for Cactus Facts, and learn about our spiky pals.

Cactus Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you pricklier.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Cactus Facts" or "Alexa, open Cactus Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
